EmailTemplate.name: 09-19-2022 RET Freshop ABM Campaign Southeastern Grocers Email 2.Email 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Want to Stop Sharing Your eCommerce Data? Try NCR Freshop.
EmailTemplate.textOnly: At Southeastern Grocers, you know the power of eCommerce for your shoppers. And you probably already know that by next year, online grocery sales are expected to reach $129.72B, nearly 10% of all grocery sales. But if you’re operating on a complex eCommerce solution today without having a fully integrated, future-flexible solution, how can you reap the full benefits of this booming market? Don't entrust your customer's shopping experience and data to anyone but you. Partner with NCR Freshop. We look forward to hosting you for a demo! ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> Got questions?
